name: Yaja Live Video Chat - Meet new people
description: Connect to the world with Yaja Live. Yaja Live connects you with people from over 200 countries. You can easily make a lot of friends with different and variety of languages and culture.  - Meet new people across the world through random live video chats - Select your preferences on Gender, Age and Region. - Chats are translated in real time. Do not hesitate to send a message to foreigners. - Send messages or direct video calls to existing friends. - You dont need to watch unwanted opponents video any more by using facial recognition functionality.   Share Yaja Live with people around you and make more connections Please leave a review on the Goole Play Store. Your review will help make Yaja Live a better service.   Security Management Policy Yaja Live aims for a better and enjoyable community. Please respect other users and follow our guidelines to make a better community. Any violation against our policies will be taken seriously and will lead to account suspension.  Yaja Live emphasizes users privacy. Yaja Live treats all user information with strict confidentiality.  Please take caution when delivering sensitive information, because you are responsible for the information you provide to the other party through Yaja Live. Even though Yaja Live does not save any video chat or screenshot, Yaja Live has no control of outside-app in the users device.   Additional Information Operator data charges may apply. Yaja Live recommend using an unlimited data plan or Wi-fi connection.   About Permissions : - Camera : It is used to send video from camera to the other in the video call. - Microphone : It is used to transmit voice from the microphone in the video call. - Storage : It is used to send or download a photo in the chat room - Phone status : It is used to stop or resume video call upon the phone status.
